Class OAIPMHUtil

extends Object
    Utility class providing common functionality for OAI reposities.
    Author:
    Ayco Holleman

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      Datetime pattern that can optionally also be used for OAI-PMH requests (yyyy-MM-dd)

      Formats dates according to dateFormat.

    • Method Detail

      • createResponseSkeleton

        public static OAIPMHtype createResponseSkeleton(OAIPMHRequest request)
        Creates the outer XML elements of an OAI-PMH response. The method is called by the REST layer to initialize the response, leaving it to the OAI repository to fill in the blanks.
        Parameters:
        request -
        Returns:
